title: Schema for Playwright Merge Reports Executor
description: THIS IS AN INTERNAL EXECUTOR USED BY ATOMIZED TASKS. DO NOT USE IT DIRECTLY. Merge Playwright blob reports and aggregate the results.

config.description: The Playwright configuration file path. Relative to the project root.

expectedSuites.description: The expected number of test suites to produce a report.

skipBlobReporter.description: Whether to skip generating the blob reporter output.
